website_summaries.verdict: With wheels for portability and room for over 30 long- and short-handled tools, this is a versatile and sturdy garden tool organizer.
pros: Sturdy construction with plenty of room for gardening tools of different sizes
Slots of varying sizes with clips hold handles securely in place
Casters allow it to be conveniently wheeled along for on the move use
cons: Plastic casters feel a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and does exactly what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I'm able to put all our garden type tools on it. That would have been sufficient, but when I found out how easily it rolled around it made it that much better. It's very, very easy to put together with no small parts. It just pushes together, poles into holes, wheels into holes, done. I'd buy it again, but I think this one may last me for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Listening

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for tool organization
customer_reviews.text: Lets start with assembly. The directions are easy to read, very clear and easy to follow. All of the parts were there and fit together with no problems. I'm a seventy something woman and had this put together in less than ten minutes and that's with a couple of interruptions . The cart is very easy to move. We have several tools onboard with room for more. It really helps to make the garage look neater and the tools are easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Sluna

customer_reviews.title: A Good tool rack
customer_reviews.text: My old tool rack was poorly conceived and sloppily engineered. Nevertheless, I kept it for nearly 20 years until it fell apart. This rack is a great design in that most of the slots allow you to clip the tools into it. I hate assembling anything. This was really easy to put together and required no tools. I am extremely happy with it. There are a lot of nit picking reviews below. However, for this price you cannot beat it. I cleaned my tool shed the recently, and this topped off the job by having a nice neat way to store my shovels, rakes, hoes, brooms and pick axes.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Cart
customer_reviews.text: This rolling tool cart was nice and easy to put together. It is very sturdy and of a nice quality. It arrived quickly, well packaged and in great condition. It fits a lot of tools and holds them up nicely. It keeps everything nice and neat and easy to access. I'm very happy with this cart.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyGirl85

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, junk casters.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with this product. Suncast is usually a decent home grade product but this needs some attention. As I assembled this I knew the casters were very cheap and didn't expect them to last but they broke the very first time I used this! I built this, put my handtools in it which I did not overload it and I didn't even use every slot. Moving it the very first time two of the casters snapped under the weight of the tools. There are not many options for a tool holder but I would advise you to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beard

customer_reviews.title: HITS THE SWEET SPOT WHERE FORM MEETS FUNCTION: GREAT DESIGN and A  GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This the sweet spot utility wagon where form perfectly meets function. Attractive, sturdy, cleverly designed, and mobile, this is a TERRIFIC tool cart. It actually holds all my handled tools, from the old fashioned long handled hedge trimmers , to the porch broom (I have it on my porch) to the horse manure rakes, to the garden tools, to an extra corn broom et all. There is even a wet mop tray and plenty of room underneath for a metal dustpan, a coil of spare hose and nozzle, and room for many more tools and things. GREAT DESIGN, GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: aminahyaquin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small one car garage, and we just patched and painted the walls, so we were reluctant to make new holes! We use it for a few rakes a shovel and mop and brooms.. Has lots of "holes" you can put just about anything you want handy. The leave blower fits nicely on the side which is intended for a weed whacker. The only thing is that there are only a few slots on the sides for smaller handle items (broom handle). The other larger ones have a little too much room. We also like the fact, that the shovels and rakes do not touch the floor (yes we painted that too!)
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: It's A-OK
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't give reviews, good or bad, but wanted to with this item. It was so easy to assemble--NO TOOLS needed. I didn't even have to read the instructions as it was that easy. When I got to the step of inserting the casters I thought for sure I would need to leave that job for my grandson to finish. But they were easy too. I assembled in the house and rolled it into the garage. In fact the mess I cleaned up from the old tool rack was more work and sweat than putting the new one together. P.S. I'm over 80 yrs. old and speak the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Calif. Granny

customer_reviews.title: Greay Tool cart!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item so far! The packaging was a little banged up..but the tool cart was not damaged. It holds all my tools and it appears to be we built. The poles are metal inside. Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Keenbeen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This cart accepts all the tools I need in a well organized manner. Its a good value and eliminates putting holes in my walls for storage of shovels, brooms, etc. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bline

customer_reviews.title: Good tool rack
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to tidy up an area of my garage and thought this would fit the bill. It does! It is very sturdy, it has never hinted at tipping over when I roll it out. I like the little black plastic piece that swings out to allow you to remove the weed trimmer on the end of the unit. My only negative is that I would have likes the holes to have a couple of different sizes so that bigger or smaller items could be placed securely in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy solution to garage clutter
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-designed storage solution for the brooms and gardening implements that clutter up garages. Assembly was a snap - literally - no tools needed. We had had a stationary "corner" storage unit that was inherently unstable - brooms, shovels, rakes stored heavy side up with an inadequate base. This unit stores tools with the heavy ends down and has the bonus of mobility when you're cleaning the garage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jungleone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching when seeking to buy an outdoor tool cart. I purchased this one based upon the reviews and on my need for something that could live outside. It was super easy to put together and seems very sturdy. I put a fair amount of tools in it already and it still has space. Looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Seems perfect for what I needed. Always hesitate good reviews until I've had it for awhile. Rest assured, if it fails me for any reason in the future, beyond my control, I'll be back. I take good care of my stuff, so it would be a design flaw or failure. But for now, I like.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Rolling great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this as a garden tool and house tool organizer. I keep my mop, broom and shovels right next to the door leading out to garage. Slides easy across concrete floor with full load. The holes on top aren't real big so I use those for thinner handle stuff. Been using for about a year. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well conceived
customer_reviews.text: The item is a well engineered rolling tool cart for the money. Pros are the clever side-by-side arrangement of tools so you can easily identify the one you need, the head down storage which gives the cart added stability and the variable size grip clips that accommodate a wide variety of tools. It assembles easily in five minutes. The only negative are the casters which do roll easily on a basement or garage floor but certainly are meant for yards or gravel drives.
customer_reviews.author: doc sjc

customer_reviews.title: A good Suncast garden tool holder.
customer_reviews.text: This Suncast garden tool holder is very sturdy. I put all kind of tools on it and it rolls around just fine. It is used inside a Suncast shed. Suncast appear to make good sheds and tool holders. The reviews I read didn't let me down. I would like to thank the other people for doing their reviews also they have really helped me make purchase decisions.
customer_reviews.author: PJ 17

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: With no screws to hold it together, it easily falls apart when moving it, especially the top piece that the tools pop into. I can put a lot on it, but things slide off the sides and the holes may vary in size but may not fit the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Soozbie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Garage Organizer
customer_reviews.text: We are using the cart for yard tools,rakes, flags, brooms, weed eater, snow shovels and more. Easy to move and such a great way to keep things organized. We got everything in the cart with spaces to spare. I wish a few of the slots had tighter openings to snap handles in place, but no worries, we just used a small line to keep them from falling out. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: lovesgoldens13

customer_reviews.title: It's OK...
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy. The clips that hold in the tools don't really hold the tools that well. Also, using the holes on the top of the unit to store long-handled tools doesn't work for me, because my garage ceiling isn't particularly high.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Thing went together in 2 min or less. Does exactly what I wanted which was to house random long tools and move around as needed. Even though it just sorta slides together seems relatively sturdy so far even after my kids had too much run rolling it around.
customer_reviews.author: Cinora

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to organize our outdoor tools. Used to use an old plastic trash can, but it was top heavy with shovels, etc and tended to fall over in high winds. The Suncast cart alleviated this problem. It was a bit pricier than other options, but appears to be well worth the difference. It went together easily and looks to be delivering on what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vantrease

customer_reviews.title: What a handy way to store garden tools!
customer_reviews.text: My garage was a mess. This tool rack really helped me clean it up. It provides easy-to-reach storage of all sorts of long-handled tools, rakes, brooms, etc. In fact, I bought another one for my utility closet and still another one for my boat garage. They even roll, which is a nice bonus. EDITED to say that I could have gotten rid of some of those things. Having them sorted out on the tool racks made it clear to me that I'm holding on to some of the tools way too long. It's just hard to get rid of them when they wear out or are replaced by something better.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one a couple years ago and just received a second one. Sturdy, easy to put together, holds a lot, nice size and color. Everything has a home, so no clutter laying around or propped against the wall. The wheels are a plus for easy moving.
customer_reviews.author: toby1949

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my application
customer_reviews.text: I put in in my new shed without the casters installed. I have no plans to roll it around, and it is more secure this way. It's positioned in front of a wall-mounted Suncast 4-foot garden tool hanger. Between the two I can store all my long-handled tools neatly and accessibly
customer_reviews.author: Dave Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: I like this but want the holes to be larger so that it can fit all sizes of broom handles etc. Otherwise it's nice but the small holes reduce what can actually be stored
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unbox, and assemble. Appears to be sturdy wheels appear to be sturdy the picture show that all of our yard products work good in it and maneuvers well around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Billger

customer_reviews.title: Great way to store tools
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store tools. I had a square one that had holes in the top you poked the handles through, that meant all the heavy ends were UP and the cart tipped like crazy with the slightest bump. This cart allows you to push the handles into slots from the side, and you can put the heavy end DOWN, makes it a lot more stable. Also means you can put longer tools in this under a lower roof without having to pull them straight up to get them in or out.
customer_reviews.author: Rootman

customer_reviews.title: Garage Organization Addition
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was thrilled to get my yard tools off the walls and out of bins, consolidated into this! Super sturdy and space saving.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marzano

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool cart!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic design. Very sturdy and easy to move around. I have mine completely loaded down and it is still very easy to move around my shop and the tools are secure. I am actually going to order a second cart to keep garden tools separate from all others. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Durable and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Easy to assemble and easy to use. We keep it outside and it holds up in the weather. Got lots of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Sturdy, holds a zillion tools ( even small hand shovels on top holes), has wheels and easy to get tools in/out. It's also not too large. Fits nicely on side of garage.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2CC

customer_reviews.title: No more mess
customer_reviews.text: Just love this tool cart hold alot and stores alot of tools, rakes and even watering cans. Easy to move around better then wall organizer for me.would say try it you will love it and price is good.
customer_reviews.author: EFC

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fir awhile but fully loaded cart started to lean and bow. Won’t roll on casters. Eventually after two years the cart broke in half. I guess two years is an ok life for the price but would not buy again. Could never roll it. This time I will just buy a stationary cart.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Item seems sturdy enough and is holding a LOT of tools. It was missing the casters so maneuverability is ZERO but there was no way to give 0 stars. Seller has not responded to my request for additional 2 casters that would make it maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence M Tryon

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect tool cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart was the solution to my problem of not wanting to put nails in the walls to hang tools. It offers organization with plenty of space to store all the essentials. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Tool Storage
customer_reviews.text: The tool rack is decent for storing multiple hand tools. The base of the stand is slick and causes the tolls to slide, which I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cart. Was extremely easy to assemble and is very sturdy. Holds all of my garden tools. I have moved it several times and did not have any issues with tipping with the tools on it
customer_reviews.author: Tammie W

customer_reviews.title: Well-built
customer_reviews.text: This tool stand is solidly built and can keep quite many tools. Most of the holders can hold a wider size handles, like shovels and picks; there are only a couple of smaller holders for thinner leaf rake handles. I placed it outside, in the backyard and did not attach the wheels. The plastic in the foundation and the top part is thick and sturdy, does not bend even with several picks and shovels in place. I hope it will take a while for the sun to make it crumbly. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: uniq

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and I'm kicking myself for not buying this earlier to organize all my garden tools normally strewn around my yard
customer_reviews.author: Rudy G

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Needed!
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy cart is exactly what we needed to store our garden tools. It does have wheels so we can easily move it when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Slfrance

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT - LOVE THE WHEELS.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Love the wheels. Everything fits. I wish that some of the slots were "adjustable". It would be easier because all brooms and racks have different thicknesses. So far, I make do.
customer_reviews.author: Barbaral7722

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This holds a TON of stuff. It was easy to put together, and arrived with no extra (or missing) parts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Maier

customer_reviews.title: Out of the ordinary usage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack not for tools in the garage but to store flags in my church, which were in quite a mess (Scout flags, US flags, Patrol flags). I took the casters off and modified the base (added a slotted cleat) to keep the butt-end of the poles from sliding out, then put in a bungee on each side to keep each flag in its slot. The flags just clear the ceiling in the storage area and are easily findable and much neater. I like the idea of storing the flags in a respectful, orderly manner.
customer_reviews.author: Horvis Monticular

customer_reviews.title: Keeps tools orderly
customer_reviews.text: Keeps tools from being a jumbled mess. Not as portable as we'd like, but still holds tools well.
customer_reviews.author: CMama

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality - Can't use all spaces if items have ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality - Can't use all spaces if items have large head; but this has been a problem with every rack I have owned. - Would buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Original.Grumpy.Bear

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Great item for long handled tools. I am a senior female who is somewhat handy and it wasn't difficult to put together. The tools feel steady and I really like not having to duck falling rakes and shovels. Also like the casters so I can move it out of the way. There are different sized holes down the middle for more versatility. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried since this is a product composed of plastic. However, it has proven itself as a very sturdy organizer. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella2012

customer_reviews.title: Get access to the garden tool you need!
customer_reviews.text: I got all my tools in places I could get them out of without needing a vaulted ceiling. Mine are stored in a SunCast Shed not a garage. I really liked the variety of holding options too. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have a handful of yard tools and It’s far more convenient for me to use this cart vs the time consuming task of hanging up a wall organizer and I can move it around as needed. Very sturdy and easily holds large, medium and small tools. This was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, feels very sturdy. I even sat on the bottom cart to test it and it bearly flexed (150lbs). More expensive ones with plastic upright supports had reviews complaining about them leaning and bending after too much weight and time but the metal supports on this feel like they'll hold up to alot of abuse. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at the Rubbermaid version of this cart, when I found this option. Very happy with it so far. It's sturdy, holds plenty of tools, and costs a lot less that the Rubbermaid version. This is the one to buy if you need one, no reason to pay for the name.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it organizes all my garden/garage tools into one easy place! AND I love that I can move that place around my garage! Rollers are my new favorite organizational must! My only complaint are that the wheels are not the best. They don't roll as smoothly or feel as strong as the ones on my rolling shoe rack and rolling laundry holder (the wheels are much higher quality, stronger materials). These plastic ones just don't feel like they will hold up if I were to really load the cart down or move it all over. Why didn't the company just go the extra mile and send 4 long-lasting, good quality wheels? Otherwise, it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Stable
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice surprise. This is stable, has lots of storage room and I'm more than pleased with it. Assembly took only a few minutes, no problem. Sure helped to straighten up my messy garage. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Cee

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack for garden tools, shovels, brooms and more. It is very sturdy and on wheels so it is movable;
customer_reviews.author: Bart M. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Did some research before purchasing. Bought this one due to the strong recommended reviews. Glad I did. Cleaned up a corner in my garage where shovels and rakes etc were on top of each other. This cart tidies it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rzewuski

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It holds a bunch of my garden tools and there is still space for more. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Place for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! There is a place for everything in this compact unit and now I have everything I need organized! My garage looks great and I just roll it out to the driveway and have everything I need for yard work!
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Well Made & Practical
customer_reviews.text: I'm immensely pleased with this trolley. It's easy to assemble and extremely well-made. I recommend it unreservedly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Astor

customer_reviews.title: The casters make it easy to move it around the garage
customer_reviews.text: This cart holds SO many garden tools! We were running out of wall space. My yard tools are now neatly organized all in one place. The casters make it easy to move it around the garage. Assembly was quick and easy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JennMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.  Practical design.  Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for me. It works exactly how it is described. I like the fact that it’s on wheels. Can be rolled out of the garage when several tools are needed and hosed down when dirty. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our new organized garage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our new organized garage! So much more convenient than hanging tools on the wall. Easily accessible and we still have slots left to add more tools.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden Tool Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Suncast garden tool stand. First one was left with our previous house. The second is in use now at my main house. The third is at our cottage. It works great, easy to roll around for cleaning and washes up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light, sturdy and an excellent space saver
customer_reviews.text: the product was easy to assemble, and very convenient to use. i appreciate the wheels. good value. good product. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the cart but there is nowhere for a leaf blower or hedge trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, one complaint...
customer_reviews.text: I have this cart packed with tools. All of my yard tools, as well as an extension cord looped on the end. I love that it has wheels to easily move it around my garage from time to time. The only complaint that I have is that there is no lip on the base, so some of my shovels slip off. However, it's not a show stopper and I would get another one hands down if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: FuDogDad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for garden tools!
customer_reviews.text: My garden tools fit perfectly on the cart. Lot more convenient to put and remove tools than the previous cart I had. In addition, with the heavier part of the tool on the base, the Suncast tool cart won't stretch and bend as my previous cart did.
customer_reviews.author: Knoxgardener

customer_reviews.title: The rolling tool cart was easy to assemble and had ample space to hold all ...
customer_reviews.text: The rolling tool cart was easy to assemble and had ample space to hold all of my tools. Wasn't crazy about the plastic wheels but they work.
customer_reviews.author: Candace B

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for us in storing our lawn and garden tools and it fits into the side area of the garage easily and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST PERFECT CART
customer_reviews.text: I like this cart a lot and actually bought 2 for my garage. It snaps together easily and is very sturdy. Two of the wheels lock so it won't go rolling down the driveway on it's own. The only reason I rated it a 4 instead of a 5 is because it needs a rim on each side of the base. Items that are place handle down such as a mop or broom slip off to the side when moving the cart or pulling out another item. You end up constantly re-positioning them so the handles don't drag on the floor. A rim would help and make this a perfect 5.
customer_reviews.author: Sue N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stores a ton of tools. Helped clean my garage up well!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational cart!!
customer_reviews.text: Typical well made Suncast product. Holds all my long and short handle garden tools!! Like having everything organized in one place!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Suncast does it again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this caddy! So simple to put together! Keeps all my shovels and rakes vertically secure and organized. Easy to maneuver around the garage. You can roll the whole caddy outside to your project site! Thanks Suncast!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Mcelroy

customer_reviews.title: Organize and stabilize your tools
customer_reviews.text: This tool cart is the right price, holds a ton of gear, and is surprisingly extremely stable even when fully loaded. Rakes, brooms, shovels, weed whackers, smaller garden tools; there's a place for everything with the variety of different sized holders. We keep ours outside without the wheels on, and it has withstood northwest windstorms without toppling.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleSaltyDog

customer_reviews.title: Great organization purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize our tools!! Has lots of space!! Pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product as an organizer for my gardening tool. I have had good luck with suncast products so far and fine them to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Winston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This plastic tool storage was easy to put together and holds a lot of tools. Like it’s mobility.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaSue

customer_reviews.title: Great item, love how many tools it holds in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item, love how many tools it holds in a small space. Also appreciate the casters to move it short distances in the garage to clean around it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty B

customer_reviews.title: It wheels around and appear sturdy enough. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The cart is a handy cart. It wheels around and appear sturdy enough. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Oppriecht

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed to organize my yard tools!
customer_reviews.author: D12662D

customer_reviews.title: Msorganizer
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing garage broom and mops, buckets , etc..
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Noyola

customer_reviews.title: Still using this item after a year.
customer_reviews.text: It holds a lot of items in one place. No Complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Jackovich

customer_reviews.title: Where have this thing been all  my life.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It was assembled in 5 minutes with ease. No tools, no screws needed. I am a glorified weekend warrior when it comes to the yard and the cart holds most every tool in the arsenal. Fully loaded, the wheels are a little resistive when the cart is fully loaded, but I didn't buy it for the wheels!
customer_reviews.author: skeet

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, not strong.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent cart but the casters are not for outdoors. The top portion of this is not as strong as the rest of the cart.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Suncast Rolling Tool Cart
customer_reviews.text: The tool cart was very easy to assemble...no tools required. It holds all of my outdoor tools, including a heavy duty extenstion cord, blower, and weed whacker. It helped tremendously in organizing my garage, which is exactly why I purchased it. I would definately recommend this to anyone who is looking for a simple way to get organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a friend's cart by another brand and it is very flimsy like it's going to topple over. I was weary to buy anything like it because I figured it wouldn't be sturdy. But this product is actually quite sturdy. I think it really helps that it is wider at the bottom and comes in narrower at the top. The wheels are great and it looks great with the tools in it. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: D. Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy...poles are made of steal with A rubber covering. NICE !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zink

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. Very sturdy. I have a cleaning business and am using this for mop handles, brooms, etc....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I bought for my garage. It put all of my tools in one neat area and is very easy to access all of my tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and strong enough for all my garden tools. Rolls around easy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome holds everything and more
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for . Awesome holds everything and more.Anyone who need something to hold their yard tools etc I recommend this . One the best things I have purchased lately..
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: great tool holder
customer_reviews.text: Is great for not only outdoor tools, but indoor tools, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Laundry Queen

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product
customer_reviews.text: I have a tool cart made by another manufacturer that is very unstable. After reading the reviews I decided to invest in the Suncast rolling cart. Not only is this item more stable, but the receptacles for tools make it easy to position items on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana MOG

customer_reviews.title: Great tool cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy & holds a lot of tools. I am very, very pleased with this cart.
customer_reviews.author: JollyJo

customer_reviews.title: great for most  tools
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is strong, and particularly good for shorter heavy tools, like axes, picks, shovels, even a long pitch fork, as it is important to have heavy items resting on the base, to support and balance it. Also, liked the casters to help move it into position, initially. (I use a different type of caddy for long rakes and tall wide brooms.)
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, now I have all my garden tools ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, now I have all my garden tools and accessories in one place. Super easy to put together. Super sturdy, will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE DAVISSON

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for yard/work tools
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep shovels, rakes, brooms, etc. organized on an easy rolling cart.
customer_reviews.author: Credus

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: Have this in my garage for my rakes, brooms, other outdoor tools and they look so good and organized. It's in fact very heavy duty- not cheap plastic like some.
customer_reviews.author: J J shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great cart.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, durable and goes together in 5 minutes. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Carolyn O
customer_reviews.text: Love this organization tool. Put it down in the basement so I can get organize.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynO.

product_meta.title: Suncast Tool Cart with Wheels - Durable Rolling Tool Cart - Move & Store Tools, Power Trimmers, Rakes, Shovels - Store Easily in Garage, Shed - Holds up to 30 Tools
product_meta.description:
Portable long handled tool Rack with wheels, 4 high quality casters, holds approximately 30 tools, side access tool slots with clip, steel core structure, patents pending. This product is highly durable. This product is made in china. Amazon.com Suncast's rolling yard tool cart will hold up to 20 large and 17 small tools, and it's designed for stability and mobility. A sturdy steel core and heads-down tool storage give it a low center of gravity, and the cart comes mounted on four casters. Storage slots are mounted back to back so you don't have to move one tool out of the way to get to another. This cart lets you take the storage to the tools so you don't have to make multiple trips in order to get your yard clean.--Josh DettweilerWhat's in the BoxStorage cart with casters Amazon.com Suncast's rolling yard tool cart will hold up to 20 large and 17 small tools, and it's designed for stability and mobility. A sturdy steel core and heads-down tool storage give it a low center of gravity, and the cart comes mounted on four casters. Storage slots are mounted back to back so you don't have to move one tool out of the way to get to another. This cart lets you take the storage to the tools so you don't have to make multiple trips in order to get your yard clean.--Josh DettweilerWhat's in the BoxStorage cart with casters

AMAZON.COM
Suncast's rolling yard tool cart will hold up to 20 large and 17 small tools, and it's designed for stability and mobility. A sturdy steel core and heads-down tool storage give it a low center of gravity, and the cart comes mounted on four casters. Storage slots are mounted back to back so you don't have to move one tool out of the way to get to another. This cart lets you take the storage to the tools so you don't have to make multiple trips in order to get your yard clean.--Josh Dettweiler

What's in the Box
Storage cart with casters
feature_bullets: 4-WHEEL TOOL CART: Portable garden cart with four caster wheels perfect for transporting items from your shed to garden
HOLD MULTIPLE TOOLS: This rolling yard cart can hold up to 20 large tools and 17 small tools- making outdoor work a breeze
DURABLE: Constructed of durable plastic with a steel core, this garden cart will provide years of quality use
EASY ACCESS: Storage slots are conveniently designed back-to-back so you don't have to move tools around to reach what you need
IDEAL SIZE: This rolling tool cart measures 6" x 20" x 42", perfect for your shed or garden

specifications.Included Components: Tools Storage, Toolbox, Tool Organization & Garage Storage
